options.name: CONFIG_MULTIBOOT_BOOTLOADER
options.title: Multiboot 0.6.96 support
options.description: Enable Multiboot 0.6.96 support. The kernel will be able to get it's information from a Multiboot 0.6.96 compliant bootloader. If multiple bootloader specs are enabled the kernel will figure it which one is being used. If none are enabled the kernel will not boot.

options.name: CONFIG_COMPILE_BUILTINS
options.title: Compiler builtins
options.description: Compile and link compiler builtins for handling non-native operations. This may be necessary to even compile the kernel.
